#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int n,m,a[13][13];

int main(){
	a[0][0]=a[1][0]=a[2][0]=a[3][0]=a[4][0]=a[5][0]=a[6][0]=a[7][0]=a[8][0]=a[9][0]=a[10][0]=a[11][0]=a[12][0]=1;
	int t,i,j,k;
	for(i=1;i<=12;i++)for(j=1;j<=i;j++)a[i][j]=a[i-1][j-1]+a[i-1][j];
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		scanf("%d",&n);scanf("%d",&m);
		printf("%d\n",a[m+n][m]);
	}
	return 0;
}
